actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate concerning U.S. Military Forces in the Persian Gulf region.

summary.text: Expresses support for: (1) bipartisan efforts to bring peace to the Persian Gulf region; (2) the diplomatic initiatives undertaken by President Bush, the deployment of U.S. armed forces to the region, and the adoption of United Nations Security Council Resolution 678; and (3) the goals and objectives of Operation Desert Shield. Urges the U.S. armed forces to continue to develop a strategy, plans, and contingency capability to achieve a quick, decisive victory in the event that the use of military force against Iraq becomes necessary.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate concerning U.S. Military Forces in the Persian Gulf region.
